text: Miguel Jones Castillo (27 October 1938 – 8 April 2020) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a midfielder for SD Indautxu and Atlético Madrid during the 1950s and 1960s. In October 1967, Jones was signed for a season with Osasuna, his last club. After retiring as a player he returned to live in Bilbao and was a director at SD Indautxu. He was born in Santa Isabel, Spanish Guinea (now Malabo, Equatorial Guinea). Jones, who had cancer, died on 8 April 2020 in Bilbao from COVID-19 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish footballers
title: Miguel Jones
